contentrichtext.text: {{other uses|Qasimabad (disambiguation)}} {{Infobox settlement |official_name =Qasemabad |native_name=قاسم آباد |settlement_type = city |pushpin_map =Iran |mapsize =150px |coordinates_region = IR |subdivision_type = [[List of countries|Country]] |subdivision_name = {{flag|Iran}} |subdivision_type1 =[[Provinces of Iran|Province]] |subdivision_name1 =[[Razavi Khorasan Province|Razavi Khorasan]] |subdivision_type2 =[[Counties of Iran|County]] |subdivision_name2 =[[Khvaf County|Khvaf]] |subdivision_type3 =[[Bakhsh]] |subdivision_name3 =[[Jolgeh Zozan District|Jolgeh Zozan]] |leader_title = |leader_name = |established_title = |established_date = |area_total_km2 = |area_footnotes = |population_as_of = 2006 |population_total =4022 |population_density_km2 =auto |timezone = [[Iran Standard Time|IRST]] |utc_offset = +3:30 |timezone_DST = [[Iran Daylight Time|IRDT]] |utc_offset_DST = +4:30 |coordinates_display = % |latd=34|latm=21|lats=44|latNS=N |longd=59|longm=51|longs=59|longEW=E |elevation_m = |area_code = |website = |footnotes ={{GEOnet2|32FA8809650B3774E0440003BA962ED3}} }} '''Qasemabad''' ({{lang-fa|قاسم آباد}}; also [[Romanize]]d as '''Qāsemābād''')<ref>{{GEOnet3|-3079901}}</ref> is a city in [[Jolgeh Zozan District]], in [[Khvaf County]], [[Razavi Khorasan Province]], [[Iran]]. At the 2006 census, its population was 4,022, in 850 families.<ref>{{IranCensus2006|09}}</ref> == References == {{reflist}} {{Razavi Khorasan Province}} {{Khvaf County}} [[Category:Populated places in Khvaf County]] [[Category:Cities in Razavi Khorasan Province]] [[Category:Cities in Iran]] {{Khvaf-geo-stub}}
